comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content: Sopwith came to USA in May 1911 to fly in airmeets and conduct passenger carrying flights . In May 1911 flights at Philadelphia.  Gave passenger carrying flights at Nassau Boulevard Aerodrome (Long Island) and also flew at Chicago International Airmeet   August 1911 and at Nassau Boulevard Aerodrome Airmeet of September 1911.
